{{ja-kanjitab|おお|つ|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おおつ|大|tr1=ō|t1=big, large|津|tr2=tsu|t2=harbor, port}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|おおつ|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おおつ|hhira=おほつ}}

# a large [[port]] or [[harbor]]
# a type of [[mud]] used as an [[overcoat]] for an [[earthen]] or mud [[wall]], named for the town of Ōtsu where it was produced
# short for {{m|ja|大津馬|tr=Ōtsu uma}}, a [[stage]] [[horse]] from the town of Ōtsu

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|おおつ|hhira=おほつ}}

# [[w:Ōtsu,_Shiga|Ōtsu]], the [[capital]] [[city]] of [[w:Shiga Prefecture|Shiga Prefecture]] and an important [[port]] on [[w:Lake Biwa|Lake Biwa]]
# the name of various other places in Japan
# {{surname|lang=ja|sort=おおつ}}
